character.age: 200 years old, but appears to be in her mid-30s due to Dwarven aging
character.background: Elara was born and raised in the underground city of Kragnir. She discovered she had a magical affinity at a young age and became an apprentice to the High Priestess of her people's faith. She seeks to unite the fractured clans of Dwarves against an ancient threat.

physical-appearance.hair-color: Dark brown, often worn in a ponytail
